review: Great! Easy to install. Love it.

review: Nice selection of Prime movies available. Much better interface than on our BluRay player.

review: Love love it. One of best things every!!!

review: It was simple to install and works just as described.  My biggest regret is that I didn't purchase it years ago.

review: I love my Fire TV Stick, I also have Roku3 which cost me around $100 ,Fire Stick cost around $35 with almost the same features so what's not to love?.

review: I love it...all I needed and more!!!

review: I am so happy with my Fire Stick! It was so easy to install and I was streaming instantly.  I love that Amazon has some of the old black and white classics!  I watch every day!

review: It works about as well as expected.
